rules_text:
Target creature you control gets +3/+0 until end of turn. Each other creature you control gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
Cache {2}{W} [i]({2}{W}, Exile this card from your hand: Draw a card. You can cast this later by also discarding a card.)[/i]
When you cache this card, create two tapped 1/1 white Ally creature tokens.
